医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超重的人可能对 COVID-19 感染的抗体反应受损昆士兰大学领导的研究表明，超重会损害人体对 SARS-CoV-2 感染的抗体反应，但不会损害疫苗接种提供的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Overweight-people-may-have-impaired-antibody-response-to-COVID-19-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Overweight-people-may-have-impaired-antibody-response-to-COVID-19-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cff0040-9830-4002-a0a8-9975d32fa0dc Mon, 04 Dec 2023 14:36:35 -0500 Overweight people may have impaired antibody response to COVID-19 infection
新发现揭示了 CRISPR-Cas 抗病毒防御系统的另一层Mogila、Tamulaitiene 等人最近在《科学》杂志上发表的文章。代表了 Gintautas Tamulaitis 小组成功科学研究的延续。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-discovery-unveils-an-additional-layer-of-the-CRISPR-Cas-antiviral-defense-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-discovery-unveils-an-additional-layer-of-the-CRISPR-Cas-antiviral-defense-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82a89ae8-fe7c-436e-966b-72851cbbd63b Mon, 04 Dec 2023 14:27:52 -0500 New discovery unveils an additional layer of the CRISPR-Cas antiviral defense system
神经影像和网络建模工具揭示了动物模型中的阿尔茨海默病印第安纳大学的研究人员正在合作开发一种新方法，使用神经影像和网络建模工具（之前开发用于分析临床患者的大脑）来研究临床前动物模型中阿尔茨海默病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Neuroimaging-and-network-modeling-tools-shed-light-on-Alzheimers-disease-in-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Neuroimaging-and-network-modeling-tools-shed-light-on-Alzheimers-disease-in-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91f0f385-bbde-4f77-b77c-62dea65ae365 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 14:19:43 -0500 Neuroimaging and network modeling tools shed light on Alzheimer's disease in animal models
美国心理学会报告强调了打击错误信息的有效策略美国心理学会最近的一份报告回顾了现有的心理科学研究，以探索和打击健康错误信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/American-Psychological-Association-report-highlights- effective-strategies-to-combat-misinformation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/American-Psychological-Association-report-highlights- effective-strategies-to-combat-misinformation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f814b558-1503-4c11-aff4-32189358212f Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:59:00 -0500 American Psychological Association report highlights effective strategies to combat misinformation
带有微型传感器的轻型头盔记录大脑活动产生的磁场五年前，一个戴着记录大脑功能的头盔的人在房间里走来走去似乎就像科幻小说一样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Lightweight-helmet-with-tiny-sensors-records-Magnetic-fields- generated-by-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Lightweight-helmet-with-tiny-sensors-records-Magnetic-fields- generated-by-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8005e3d-b415-4ec8-a120-47a6d73965e1 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:58:13 -0500 Lightweight helmet with tiny sensors records magnetic fields generated by brain activity
LysoPI 脂质有望促进糖尿病患者的胰岛素分泌虽然糖是 2 型糖尿病最常被提及的罪魁祸首，但更好地了解脂肪的作用也至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/LysoPI-lipids-show-promise-in-boosting-insulin-secretion-in-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/LysoPI-lipids-show-promise-in-boosting-insulin-secretion-in-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53df08b1-f659-40dc-b5a2-e8410ee8b3c9 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:44:00 -0500 LysoPI lipids show promise in boosting insulin secretion in diabetics
研究人员评估大型语言模型在产后出血患者表型分析中的表现研究人员使用出院记录评估了大语言模型 (LLM) 在对产后出血 (PPH) 患者进行表型分型方面的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Researchers-evaluate-performance-of-a-large-language-model-in-phenotyping-postpartum-hemorrhage-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Researchers-evaluate-performance-of-a-large-language-model-in-phenotyping-postpartum-hemorrhage-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ac904ce-f20f-454a-b0b6-630dd8b5e6e2 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:40:00 -0500 Researchers evaluate performance of a large language model in phenotyping postpartum hemorrhage patients
科学家发现白血病细胞利用细胞回收过程的新机制在最近的一项研究中，歌德大学生物化学 II 研究所 Stefan Müller 教授领导的科学家们研究了一种特殊形式的血癌，称为急性髓系白血病 (AML)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Scientists-uncover-new-mechanism-by-which-leukemia-cells-exploit-cellular-recycling-process.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Scientists-uncover-new-mechanism-by-which-leukemia-cells-exploit-cellular-recycling-process.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc57f59b-2dd5-468d-a79b-10b4ffc3f1f7 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:19:49 -0500 Scientists uncover new mechanism by which leukemia cells exploit cellular recycling process
新的决策规则可以减少老年人跌倒后不必要的头部 CT 扫描急诊科工作人员如何确定跌倒的老年人是否需要进行影像学检查？ CMAJ 的新研究描述了一项新的决策规则将帮助急诊科医生确定哪些老年人需要对头部受伤进行影像学检查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-decision-rule-can-reduce-unnecessary-head-CT-scans-in-older-adults-after-falls.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-decision-rule-can-reduce-unnecessary-head-CT-scans-in-older-adults-after-falls.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd5d4cb-3ab9-43a8-8963-e8c48534d544 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:08:19 -0500 New decision rule can reduce unnecessary head CT scans in older adults after falls
药房预测报告：社会问题将改变医疗保健服务社会问题-；包括超高成本治疗的增长、精神健康和药物滥用疾病的流行、气候变化以及人工智能（AI）的兴起；根据最新的年度 ASHP/ASHP 基金会药房预测报告，可以在五年内改变卫生系统为社区服务的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Pharmacy-Forecast-Report-Societal-issues-poished-to-transform-healthcare-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Pharmacy-Forecast-Report-Societal-issues-poished-to-transform-healthcare-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=febce8​​29-70f3-44f6-8d65-4c1128921016 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 12:53:47 -0500 Pharmacy Forecast Report: Societal issues poised to transform healthcare delivery
